title: Descent into the Bio-Ward
description: Inside Containment Sector 7, the walls are coated in a pulsing, fleshy substance. The 'radio signal' isn't coming from a machine—it's coming from something biological.

turns.narrative: You enter an observation deck looking down into a massive silo. The silo is filled with a giant, brain-like mass. A scientist, fused into the wall by fleshy tendrils, spots you.
turns.choice_a: Try to communicate with the scientist
turns.consequence_a: He screams in two contrasting voices—one human, one static noise—and attacks you with biological tendrils.
turns.consequence_b: You secure a preemptive strike, dealing heavy damage before he can manifest his weapons.

turns.narrative: After defeating the creature, you find a logbook on the terminal. It details 'Project Harbinger'—an attempt to use modified Scourge tissue to predict the future.
turns.choice_a: Download the logbook files to a portable drive
turns.consequence_a: You secure the digital files, but the terminal arcs electricity, dealing minor shock damage.
turns.choice_b: Rip the hard drive out manually
turns.consequence_b: You get the drive without injury, but risk corrupting the data later.

turns.narrative: The giant brain-mass below pulses, and the radio in your pocket squeals: 'INTRUDER. CORRECTION PROTOCOL INITIATED.'
turns.consequence_a: You escape the deck just as the flesh on the walls begins to seal the doors shut.
turns.choice_b: Throw an incendiary down the silo before running
turns.consequence_b: The fire burns a chunk of the brain. The static screams in agony, making your escape easier.

brain_burned.description: You escaped and significantly wounded the Harbinger mass.

fled_intact.description: You escaped, leaving the mass unharmed.

conclusion: You escaped and significantly wounded the Harbinger mass.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
